page.title: 03FORT BARNES
page.content: {INTERVIEW WITH MR.JOHN BARNES} Established in 1919 by MR Barnes' great grandfather in Cross Street Lincoln and moved to Rookery Lane in 1970.Most of the work in U.K. are departures and moving people.Business is good,especially in summer which is usually the busy season.They now have a warehouse at North Hykeham.They often take over other firms.They employ 30 people in Lincoln,20 on the vans and ten in the offices.They have 15 vans and 3 trailers.To hire a trailer costs Â£15 per day.A big van with a trailer and two men costs Â£80-Â£100 per day.A removal to Germany costs Â£800.
